Subject: Investments Dashboard Experienced Unplanned Failure Today

The investments dashboard has had an unexpected failure You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. The problem may stem from a software compatibility concern following the update to Cassandra 4.0 My name is Elena Ivanova.. I have attempted to restart the server and examine the log files, but the issue continues to persist.
